original_text: and whenever burnt offerings were presented to the Lord on the Sabbaths, at the New Moon feasts and at the appointed festivals. They were to serve before the Lord regularly in the proper number and in the way prescribed for them.
korean_text: 또 안식일과 초하루와 절기에 모든 번제를 여호와께 드리되 그가 명령하신 규례의 정한 수효대로 항상 여호와 앞에 드리며

sentences.original_text: and whenever burnt offerings were presented to the Lord
They were to serve before the Lord regularly
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주 앞에서 규칙적으로 섬겨야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: and in the way prescribed for them
